sentence.Network_en: Some soils are actually too alkaline for certain plant life.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些土壤其实碱性过强，不利于某些植物生长。

sentence.Network_en: This plant prefers alkaline soil, though it will readily tolerate some acidity.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种植物在酸性土壤中也能生存, 但硷性土壤更加适宜.

sentence.Network_en: Antacids are alkaline and they relieve pain by neutralizing acid in the contents of the stomach.
sentence.Network_cn: 抗酸剂是碱性的，通过中和胃容物中的酸来减轻疼痛。

entry.def: Something that is alkaline contains an alkali or has a pH value of more than 7.

example.ex: Some soils are actually too alkaline for certain plant life.
example.tran: 有些土壤其实碱性过强，不利于某些植物生长。

means.word_mean: 1. relating to or containing an alkali; having a pH greater than 7;

sentences.sentence: "alkaline soils derived from chalk or limestone"
